pageProps.content: [["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"AntV Infographic 有许多部分都支持自定义，包括设计（Design）、模板（Template）、主题（Theme）和资源（Resources）等。"}],"\n",["$r","p",null,{"children":["其中 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"结构"}],"、",["$r","code",null,{"children":"数据项"}]," 自定义通过 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/jsx","children":"JSX DSL"}]," 实现，写法与 React 组件相似，可灵活扩展。"]}],"\n",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"模板"}],"、",["$r","code",null,{"children":"主题"}],"、",["$r","code",null,{"children":"色板"}],"、",["$r","code",null,{"children":"资源"}]," 等则通过注册配置或函数完成。你可以根据需求选择编程扩展或配置扩展，详见各自的自定义章节。"]}]]}]]
pageProps.contentEn: [["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"AntV Infographic supports customization in many areas, including Design, Templates, Themes, and Resources."}],"\n",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Among them, ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"structures"}]," and ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data items"}]," are customized through ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/jsx","children":"JSX DSL"}],", with syntax similar to React components, allowing flexible extensions."]}],"\n",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"Templates"}],", ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"themes"}],", ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"palettes"}],", and ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"resources"}]," are completed through registered configurations or functions. You can choose programmatic extension or configuration extension based on your needs. See the respective customization sections for details."]}]]}]]
